announcements.title: Weekly Maintenance
announcements.summary: The CBHS Minecraft Server goes down briefly once a week for updates and backups.
announcements.body: Every Saturday at around 1:00 AM, the CBHS Minecraft Server will be briefly offline for routine maintenance. Expected downtime is about 30 minutes. Please finish any major activities before then.

announcements.title: The server is open!
announcements.summary: Currently vanilla, with modded coming shortly.
announcements.body: Feel free to come on in, all versions above 1.21.10+ are accepted into the server, alongside bedrock!

announcements.title: Dont forget to vote for what mods you want!
announcements.summary: We need your feedback for the mods that may be in our server shortly..
announcements.body: Please give us your feedback for mods since the moddewd version will shortly be coming out soon and we'd love to hear what suggestions you have for us (and for it to also not be bland)
